channel.title: Linux/Mac
channel.description: im wondering if it is possible to do this on a linux or mac, because my pc doesnt do it...and i got a another computer with linux and 1 with os x. so is it possible to do it? and if so, how?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2007, 01:52:30 PM[/size][hr]like in the sense of hosting the server, ik i can code on linux and os x, just idk how to host the server.

item.title: Linux/Mac
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, what i am saying is, my computer i normally do the coding on and stuff wont let me run the server off of it, so i want to use one of my other computers i have but they dont have windows…so im asking how to do all the stuff to run the server on a computer running linux or os x.
like the CLASSPATH and PATH stuff, or whatever i need to do to run a server on linux or os x

Read full topic

item.title: Linux/Mac
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I don’t understand your question completely, but the server is written in Java and therefore will run on Linux and Mac.

Read full topic
